name: HARINGHATA SAPHALYA DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY
briefDescription: Haringhata Saphalya Development Society is Located in Nadia ,West Bengal.Haringhata Saphalya Development Society registered as a Society (NGO) under West Bengal Society Registration Act 1961. Established in West Bengal 2009, H.S.D.S was pioneered by a group of young professionals, all of whom were inspired by the conviction that individuals with knowledge resources and empathy for the marginalized must work with communities at the grassroots in order to help them overcome poverty.Haringhata Saphalya Development Society is a Non-govt. Social Service Organization working in the field of Rural Development for the poor people. Community development and also poverty alleviation is the main focus of the organization. H.S.D.S. is a multi service NGO having under taken interventions in the field of primary health care, education, child right, mother & child health care, control of blindness. Although H.S.D.S. is basically based on the main principle of causing socio-economic empowerment of the poor.
